Class PackageScanner.Builder

    public static class PackageScanner.Builder
extends Object
    Use the builder to construct the PackageScanner.

      • withNs

        public PackageScanner.Builder withNs(String prefix,
                                     String uri)
        Register an additional JCR namespace prior to the scan.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the registered prefix for the namespace
        uri - the registered URI for the namespace
        Returns:
        my builder self

      • withPrivilege

        public PackageScanner.Builder withPrivilege(String... privilege)
        Register an additional JCR privilege prior to the scan. If the privilege belongs to a custom namespace, be sure to register that as well using withNs(String, String)
        Parameters:
        privilege - the name of the privilege
        Returns:
        my builder self

      • withForcedRoot

        public PackageScanner.Builder withForcedRoot(String path,
                                             String... nodeTypes)
        Force the creation of the described root path prior to the scan.
        Parameters:
        path - the JCR path
        nodeTypes - the list of nodetypes. the first element is assumed to be the primary type, with subsequent elements treated as mixin types.
        Returns:
        my builder self

      • withPreInstallPackage

        public PackageScanner.Builder withPreInstallPackage(File... preInstallPackage)
        Provide a list of package files to install before each scan. Install events raised during pre-install are not passed to each PackageListener, but errors raised are passed to the ErrorListener.
        Parameters:
        preInstallPackage - the list of pre-install package files
        Returns:
        my builder self

      • withPreInstallPackages

        public PackageScanner.Builder withPreInstallPackages(List<File> preInstallPackages)
        Provide a list of package files to install before each scan. Install events raised during pre-install are not passed to each PackageListener, but errors raised are passed to the ErrorListener.
        Parameters:
        preInstallPackages - the list of pre-install package files
        Returns:
        my builder self
